title: 4 bedroom apt for rent
posting_body: Welcome students we a nice 4 bedroom and bathroom ceramic tile in kitchen and bathroom  laminate floor AC in each rooms    .second floor.

2819 1/2 Ellendale place los Angeles ca 90007 4,3000 a month minimum one year lease  maximum 4 person no pets water/ sewer  included laundry in the building unfurnished on site parking available $100/ month.
